privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.dataControllerText: The data controller is Roomivo, a simplified joint-stock company registered in France. In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the French Data Protection Act, we are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.dataCollectedText: We only collect data necessary for the operation of our service:
privacy.identificationData: Identification data: last name, first name, email
privacy.navigationData: Navigation data: connection logs, IP address
privacy.legalBasisText: The processing of your data is based on:
privacy.contractExecution: Contract execution: provision of the matching service
privacy.legalObligation: Legal obligation: compliance with French rental laws
privacy.legitimateInterest: Legitimate interest: service improvement, fraud prevention
privacy.yourRightsText: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.rightOfAccess: Right of access: consult your data
privacy.rightOfRectification: Right of rectification: correct your data
privacy.rightToErasure: Right to erasure: delete your account and data
privacy.rightToPortability: Right to data portability: download your data
privacy.rightToObject: Right to object: refuse certain processing
privacy.exerciseRights: To exercise your rights, go to your profile or contact our DPO.
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures:
privacy.accessControl: Strict access control (RLS - Row Level Security)
privacy.transfersText: Your data is hosted in the European Union. No transfer outside the EU is made without appropriate guarantees (European Commission standard contractual clauses).
privacy.cookiesText: We only use cookies essential for the operation of the service (authentication, interface preferences). No tracking or advertising cookies are used.
privacy.contactText: For any questions regarding your personal data:
privacy.cnilComplaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL (French Data Protection Authority):

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.purposeText: These Terms of Service (ToS) govern access to and use of the Roomivo platform, a matching service between tenants and landlords, compliant with French rental legislation.
terms.acceptanceText: Using Roomivo implies full acceptance of these ToS. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.contracts: Generation of contracts compliant with French law
terms.acceptTerms: Accepting the ToS and Privacy Policy
terms.consentGDPR: Consenting to the processing of personal data (GDPR)
terms.accountSecurity: You are responsible for the confidentiality of your credentials.
terms.respectLaw: Respect the law of July 6, 1989 on residential leases
terms.diagnostics: Respect mandatory diagnostics (DPE, lead, asbestos, etc.)
terms.complianceText: Roomivo complies with French legislation in force:
terms.rentalLaw: Law No. 89-462 of July 6, 1989 on rental relations
terms.alurLaw: ALUR Law (Access to Housing and Renovated Urbanism)
terms.gdprLaw: GDPR and French Data Protection Act
terms.pricingText: Service fees are clearly displayed before any transaction. In accordance with the ALUR law, agency fees are shared between tenant and landlord according to legal rates.
terms.depositText: The security deposit is capped at 1 month's rent excluding charges for unfurnished housing, and 2 months for furnished housing, in accordance with Article 22 of the law of July 6, 1989.
terms.terminationText: You can delete your account at any time from your profile. In accordance with GDPR, your data will be deleted within 30 days, unless there is a legal obligation to retain it.
terms.liabilityText: Roomivo acts as an intermediary. We are not responsible for disputes between tenants and landlords, but offer a mediation service.
terms.jurisdictionText: These ToS are subject to French law. Any dispute will be brought before the competent French courts. In accordance with the European directive on online dispute resolution, you can also use the dispute resolution platform:
terms.contactLegal: For any questions regarding these ToS, contact us at: legal@roomivo.fr

cookie.title: Data Protection
cookie.description: We use essential cookies to ensure the proper functioning of our platform. In accordance with GDPR and French legislation, we respect your privacy. We only store cookies necessary for authentication and interface preferences.
